testcase.name: Login and fill up address form
testcase.system-out: Given Page 'https://mystore-testlab.coderslab.pl/' opened in browser........passed When Button SignIn clicked..................................................passed And Email filled............................................................passed And Password filled.........................................................passed And Button Sign clicked.....................................................passed And Address clicked.........................................................passed And Create new address clicked..............................................passed And Alias 'Ad1' field filled................................................passed And Address 'Test Street1' field filled.....................................passed And City 'Bristol' field filled.............................................passed And ZipCode 'BS 11E' field filled...........................................passed And Phone '123456789' field filled..........................................passed And Save button clicked.....................................................passed Then Check if address expectedAlias equals 'Ad1'............................passed Then Check if address Address equals 'Test Street1'.........................passed Then Check if address City equals 'Bristol'.................................passed Then Check if address ZipCode equals 'BS 11E'...............................passed Then Check if address Phone equals '123456789'..............................passed Then Delete address.........................................................passed Then Check if address deleted...............................................passed And Close browser...........................................................passed
